pack.h

00001 #ifndef PACK_H
00002 #define PACK_H
00003 
00004 /*
00005 * Simpatico - Simulation Package for Polymeric and Molecular Liquids

00008 * Distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License.

00010 
00011 namespace Util
00012 {
00013 
00014    /*
00015    * Pack an object of type T into send buffer.
00016    */
00017    template <typename T>
00018    char* pack(char* current, char* end, T* data, int count)
00019    {
00020       if (current + sizeof(data) > end) {
00021          UTIL_THROW("Attempted write past end of send buffer");
00022       }
00023       T* ptr = (T*)current;
00024       for (int i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00025          *ptr = data[i];
00026          ++ptr;
00027       }
00028       current = (char *)ptr;
00029       return current;
00030    }
00031 
00032    /*
00033    * Unpack an object of type T from recvBuffer.
00034    */
00035    template <typename T>
00036    char* unpack(char* current, char* end, T* data, int count)
00037    {
00038       if (current + sizeof(data) > end) {
00039          UTIL_THROW("Attempted read past end of recv buffer");
00040       }
00041       T* ptr = (T *)current;
00042       for (int i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
00043          data[i] = *ptr;
00044          ++ptr;
00045       }
00046       current = (char *)ptr;
00047       return current;
00048    }
00049 
00050 }
00051 #endif
